description:
Do you need to sharp your PHP skills? Do you want to become a web developer? Then you're in the right place!

Learning how to code can get you a better job and lead to a better future. This course starts you off with the basic coding language of PHP. This is a very condensed 1 hour 27 min's tutorial series that will show you how to code in PHP. Enroll to begin your journey to be a web development master.

PHP is an open source (free) scripting language that allows you to create dynamic websites and work with servers. PHP is now used on over 20 million websites and over 1 million servers worldwide.
title: Learn PHP from Scratch
